body.para: Did you ever try Felix's http://grub.enbug.org/Grub2LiveCdInstallGuide ? I was able to get grub-pc (grub2) to work for me after following the "rescue" instructions in that guide.
It's good to know that installing grub-legacy can get the system working again, but that's not a working grub2 installation.
body.footer: -- cannot boot: GRUB error symbol 'grub_puts' not found https://bugs.launchpad.net/bugs/509797 You received this bug notification because you are a member of Ubuntu Bugs, which is subscribed to Ubuntu.
